faqs.question: How does the free trial work?
faqs.answer: Start with a 14-day free trial on any plan. No credit card required. Experience the full power of Ghost Post with all features unlocked.

faqs.question: Can I change plans later?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing.

faqs.question: What happens if I exceed my visitor limit?
faqs.answer: We'll send you a notification when you're approaching 80% of your limit. You can either upgrade or continue with a small overage fee.

faqs.question: Is Ghost Post safe for my website?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Ghost follows all Google Webmaster Guidelines and uses only white-hat, approved SEO techniques.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment in full.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Ghost Post was founded in 2024 by a team of SEO experts and AI engineers who were frustrated by how complex and expensive SEO had become.
We believed that AI could handle the heavy lifting of SEO while delivering better results than traditional agencies. After two years of development, Ghost Post was born.
Today, we help over 500 businesses automate their SEO and grow their organic traffic. Our AI has generated over 50,000 pieces of content and improved rankings for millions of keywords.

privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Ghost Post collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Your privacy matters to us.
privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.intro: At Ghost Post, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered SEO platform and related services.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, company name, and payment information when you create an account or subscribe to our services. We also automatically collect technical data including IP addresses, browser type, device information, and usage patterns through cookies and similar technologies. When you connect your website to our platform, we may access publicly available website data for analysis purposes.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use your information to: provide and maintain the Service; process transactions and send related information; analyze your website and generate SEO recommendations; improve our AI models and service quality; send you technical notices, updates, and support messages; communicate about products, services, and promotions; comply with legal obligations; and protect against fraud and abuse.

sections.title: 3. AI & Data Processing
sections.content: Our AI systems process your website content and analytics data to generate SEO recommendations and content. This processing is essential to providing our Service. We do not use your proprietary content to train AI models for other customers without your explicit consent. AI-generated insights and content are produced specifically for your account and are not shared with other users.

sections.title: 4. Data Sharing & Disclosure
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with: trusted service providers who assist in operating our platform (payment processors, hosting providers, analytics services); law enforcement or government agencies when required by law; business partners with your consent; and in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets. All third-party service providers are contractually obligated to protect your data.

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest, regular security audits, access controls, and secure data storage. While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide the Service. After account deletion, we may retain certain data for up to 90 days for backup purposes, and may retain anonymized or aggregated data indefinitely for analytics and service improvement. You may request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us.

sections.title: 7. Cookies & Tracking
sections.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content. Essential cookies are required for the Service to function properly. Analytics cookies help us understand how the Service is used. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings, though disabling certain cookies may affect Service functionality.

sections.title: 8. Your Rights
sections.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to: access your personal data; correct inaccurate data; delete your data; restrict processing of your data; data portability; object to processing; and withdraw consent. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@ghostpost.ai. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

sections.title: 9. International Transfers
sections.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers are conducted in compliance with applicable data protection laws and that appropriate safeguards are in place, including standard contractual clauses and adequacy decisions where applicable.

sections.title: 10. Children's Privacy
sections.content: The Service is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately and we will take steps to delete such information.

sections.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'last updated' date. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: 12. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@ghostpost.ai or through our contact page.
